message: Hey geeks, we're launching a new product "elmenus groups", mainly a real-time updated shared basket (using sockets) that we've been hard at work on, that we'd like to get your feedback on. If interested, you can send me an email at amir.allam@elmenus.com or DM me to send you access codes as it's still in beta. Check elmenus.com/groups for a full description.
story: Amir Allam shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: elmenus Groups - Organize ordering food in your company or when dining out | elmenus.com
caption: elmenus.com
description: The ultimate solution for ordering food in a group at your company. Check your groups order instantly in a shared basket and split your bill easily
